Nerangs.ab: āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi bōy ō ī ātaxš dahišn ēn gyāg taštag kē-š hōm ud urwarām pad datuš abāz nihišn pad urwēs bē nihišn hāwan az kustag ī hōy ō kustag ī dašn āwarišn pad rōy frāz nigūn kunišn dātāi haδa.dātāi vīdaēuuāi zaraθuštrāi aṣ̌aōne aṣ̌ahe raθβe yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōθrāica frasastaiiaēca.

"āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi. He has to give bōy to the fire. At this passage, he has to put again in contact with the datuš the saucer that contains the hōm ud urwarām and (then) to put it on the urwēs; he has to bring the hāwan from the left side to the right side and put it upside-down (and continue with) dātāi haδa.dātāi vīdaēuuāi zaraθuštrāi aṣ̌aōne aṣ̌ahe raθβe yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōθrāica frasastaiiaēca."

(VVrS27.18) āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi bōy ō ī ātaxš dahišn daθušō ahurahe mazdā̊ … spəṇtanąm yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōθrāica frasastaiiaēca (VVrS27.19) āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi ēn gyāg taštag kē-š hōm ud urwarām pad datuš abāz nihišn pad urwēs bē nihišn hāwan az kustag ī hōy ō kustag ī dašn āwarišn pad rōy frāz nigūn kunišn dātāi haδa.dātāi vīdaēuuāi zaraθuštrāi aṣ̌aōne aṣ̌ahe raθβe yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōθrāica frasastaiiaēca.

(VVrS27.18) "Between āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi and daθušō ahurahe mazdā̊ … spəṇtanąm y.v.x. he has to give bōy to the fire. (VVrS27.19) āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi. At this passage, he has to put again in contact with the datuš the saucer that contains the hōm and urwarām and (then) to put it on the urwēs; he has to bring the hāwan from the left side to the right side and put it upside-down (and continue with) dātāi haδa.dātāi vīdaēuuāi zaraθuštrāi aṣ̌aōne aṣ̌ahe raθβe yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōθrāica frasastaiiaēca."
